summary: Provides a high‑level API for running performance profiling on PyTorch models, selecting and orchestrating underlying profilers (memory snapshots, Nsight, PyTorch, DCGM) according to a default schedule, and exposing simple helper functions to execute profiling steps and retrieve results.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to easily benchmark and optimize deep‑learning models by collecting detailed timing, memory, and GPU utilization metrics through a unified profiling interface.
